sense.gloss: to take into one's possession, to receive, to accept, to collect, to claim
to take into one's care (e.g. person, pet), to take custody of, to adopt
to leave, to go away, to withdraw, to get out

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑苦情↑↓くじょう↓を↑言↑↓い↓ったが、↑店↑↓みせ↓ではこのセーターを↑引↑↓|ひ↓き↑取↑↓と↓る|のを↑拒↑↓こば↓んだ。
sdata.e: I complained, but they refused to take this sweater back.

sdata.j: ロドリゴの↑家族↑↓かぞく↓は↑犬↑↓いぬ↓を↑引↑↓|ひ↓きとる|ため↑動物↑↓どうぶつ↓↑収容↑↓しゅうよう↓↑所↑↓しょ↓に↑行↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: Rodrigo's family went to the dog pound to adopt a dog.
